title: Safety certifications (electrical, fire, structural, chemical)
dataVerified: Manufacturer name, facility location, inspector ID, certification body, certificate number, standards met (UL, NFPA, ASTM, etc.), issue date, expiration date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Domain binding prevents fake certifying bodies. Human-readable certificate format. Tamper-evident. Critical for electrical products, building materials, chemical safety. Regulators and fire marshals can verify instantly. Prevents sale of uncertified dangerous products.
